venue.name: Scullers Jazz Club @ The Doubletree Guest Suites

item.description:
Earl Klugh is one of the jazz greats of the 20th Century! It will be a treat to watch him perform live in the initmate night-club setting of Scullers Jazz Club.

We'll meet up for a sundowner beforehand in the bar of the Boathouse Grille, at 7pm.
Show starts at 8pm and runs until 9:30pm or so.

*** It is best to buy a ticket ahead of time - it is reserved seating ***
*** To be seated as a group, we need to buy tickets in one reservation/ticket purchase ***
*** To be part of the group ticket purchase, you need to pay for your ticket via this Meetup, using PayPal ***
*** Ticket price including TicketWeb fees is $41.00, payable by 12 noon FRIDAY Aug. 15th ***
*** RSVP = YES plus pre-payment required to secure your ticket ***

If you buy your ticket separately or at the door / last minute, you will most likely not be seated with our group (especially if the Club is fully or close to sold out).

Parking is $5.00, in the parking garage attached to the hotel. You need to pay for your parking in cash at Scullers when you go in for the show.

For directions to Scullers/The Doubletree, see Directions
For additional info on Scullers, upcoming shows, see Scullers - Upcoming Shows
item.how_to_find_us: Will meet up at 7pm in the bar at the Boathouse Grille (same floor as Scullers)
item.name: Live Jazz! Earl Klugh at Scullers Jazz Club, Cambridge
